author: Karin Larsen
title: 7 p.m. salute to health-care workers spreads to New Westminster
description: Fiona Burrows and her air horn want others to join in the nightly show of appreciation for workers at Royal Columbian Hospital.
content:
It began Monday night in the smallest of ways  just two friends a block apart each sounding an air horn at 7 p.m. to salute to health-care workers at nearby Royal Columbian Hospital confronting the COVID-19 pandemic.
Of course, instigator Fiona Burrows is ho… [+2736 chars]
